about_the_game:
Settle Gliese is a collaborative storytelling game set in a massive dangerous world. It’s a mixture of a roguelike and a text-based roleplaying game.

Familiar roguelike features you know and love
  • Journey through wild continents and discover the settlements and communities of other players
  • Unique biomes
  • Turn-based dice rolling combat

Take on a role

  • ‘Play-act’ the character as they live out their life
  • Focus on building, creativity, and society
  • Intimate interactions in a safe space with roleplaying rules
  • Talk, write notices for others, and craft personal items and artworks to shape the society they are a part of.

In a Massively Multiplayer World
  • Collaborate to advance and survive
  • Shape the world
  • Uncover its secrets

content_descriptors.notes: Players will be able to act out various activities including those of an adult nature. Although our rules expressly forbid any sexual violence, sexual language, extremist language, or hate speech we cannot guarantee that those will not be shown to players before our moderation team can remove the offending speech. Rest assured that players who engage in this kind of activities will be permabanned.
